bibl.title: Glass Medallion in the Shape of a Lion's Head Mask.
bibl.note: Glass medallion found in 2007 at Kom el-Dikka (in the fill of a trench dug in the Early Islamic Period).

bibl.title: Classica Orientalia. Essays Presented to Wiktor Andrzej Daszewski on his 75th Birthday.

bibl.seg: Renata Kucharczyk, Glass Medallion in the Shape of a Lion's Head Mask.
Henryk Meyza & Iwona Zych (edd.), Classica Orientalia. Essays Presented to Wiktor Andrzej Daszewski on his 75th Birthday (Warsaw, 2011) pp. 277-285, 1 fig. n./bl et coul.
Glass medallion found in 2007 at Kom el-Dikka (in the fill of a trench dug in the Early Islamic Period).
